Name: Buried
About the game: You are stuck in an underground facility after an earthquake. No help available, you need to get out on your own. Only problem is, you are not alone. There are some unknown creatures in the facility too. Run, Walk or Crouch to get away from the creatures, but beware, they can hear every noise you make. The faster you try to get away, the easier it is for them to find you. Hide, Hold your breath to avoid detection when they are near. In this small horror adventure there are no saves. So when you die, you start again.
